DOC.detailed_description: This secondary data analysis exist dataset generate The Healthy Behavior Trial , NHLBI-funded randomize control trial enrol 660 post-coronary angioplasty patient October 1999 March 2001 . This study employ behavioral intervention motivate PCI patient adopt health behavior order reduce major cardiac neurologic morbidity mortality . Those control arm provide risk factor ( also obtain health risk assessment ) tell change health behavior could `` increase lifespan . '' Specific Aims : Utilizing 12 month longitudinal data patient cardiovascular disease undergone coronary angioplasty : Specific aim 1 : Determine pain mediator health behavior change 12 month . Specific aim 2 : Assess behavior change pattern 12 month , stratify degree pain , depression and/or stress . Specific aim 3 : Evaluate effect pain quality life ( physical , social , role-physical , role-emotional , vitality , mental health , bodily pain general health domain ) , combine major cardiac neurologic morbidity/mortality hospitalization 12 month .
